所有已实现的接口：
Plugin
public abstract class Splitter
extends DefaultPlugin

Split DataX job into sub-jobs. Users should implements the split rules.

另请参见：
Reader, Writer

构造方法详细信息

Splitter

public Splitter()
方法详细信息

init

public abstract int init()
Do Initialize work before split job.

返回：
0 for OK, others for failure.

split

public abstract java.util.List<PluginParam> split()
Split job into sub-jobs.

返回：
a list of PluginParam, each for sub-jobs.
抛出：
RerunableException - if split job failed.
